### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper plate factory
No structures found for copper plate factory

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure that the pipe connections are valid and the entities are close enough to be connected
- Check that the fluid system is properly set up and the pipe group is not empty

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Make sure that the entity has enough space to hold the items
- Check that the item is available in the inventory before attempting to insert it

### Errors when setting research
- Ensure that the research technology is valid and available for research
- Check that the lab has enough resources to start the research

### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has enough fuel to operate
- Check that the chest at the drop position is not full and can hold the mined resources

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel to operate
- Check that the fluid system is properly set up and the boiler is connected to a valid pipe group

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is properly connected to a valid pipe group
- Check that the fluid system is properly set up and the offshore pump has enough fluid to operate
